commit.title: [dune] [camlp5] Allow to build Coq without camlp5
commit.message:
[dune] [camlp5] Allow to build Coq without camlp5

We use the promote facility of Dune as to allow to build Coq without
Camlp5 installed, as long as you have access to an OCaml switch with
it to bootstrap.

For this, first is necessary to do a build in a switch that _has_
Camlp5. The usual `make -f Makefile.dune world` will do.

This step will generate the corresponding `.ml` files. Now, go to the
switch that doesn't have camlp5, remove the `grammar/dune` file and do
`make DUNEOPT=--ignore-promoted-rules -f Makefile.dune world`

Voilà !

[dune] [camlp5] Allow to build Coq without camlp5

We use the promote facility of Dune as to allow to build Coq without
Camlp5 installed, as long as you have access to an OCaml switch with
it to bootstrap.

For this, first is necessary to do a build in a switch that _has_
Camlp5. The usual `make -f Makefile.dune world` will do.

This step will generate the corresponding `.ml` files. Now, go to the
switch that doesn't have camlp5, remove the `grammar/dune` file and do
`make DUNEOPT=--ignore-promoted-rules -f Makefile.dune world`

Voilà !
